statements: DELETE FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Blood Pressure';
DELETE FROM HealthCareMetrics WHERE actual_value > target_value;
DELETE FROM patient_care_standards WHERE responsible_team = 'Nursing Team';
DELETE FROM quality_assurance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Error Rate' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patient_care_standards WHERE last_updated < '2022-03-15' AND responsible_team = 'Nursing';
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetricsTracking WHERE tracking_id = 10 AND tracking_result < 50;
